website_summaries.verdict: Despite the novelty of 802.11ac support, the Belkin AC 1200 is a mundane, though decent, Wi-Fi router.
pros: The Belkin AC 1200 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Router offers 802.11ac plus all the benefits of an N600 router
cons: The Belkin AC 1200 router supports only a dual-stream setup of both N and AC Wi-Fi standards, and doesn't have anything special to show

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this router
customer_reviews.text: Poor coverage. Firmware has a lot of bugs. There hasn’t been any updates since 2016( latest firmware is 4 years old). Tech support is poor.. they have no clue .. looks like they read from the manual which is probably not even up to date.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively cheap, but that's the only good thing about this router. Poor signal, reaches only 20-25 feet away from the router. Had to buy additional wifi extender to be able to use wifi in my bedroom. Buy only if you must and can't afford something more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Alen Gusa

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work any better than my old Western Digital for range or speed
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this one. It doesn't work any better than my old Western Digital for range or speed. It comes with no disk to have a control panel (i.e., to adjust settings, update, etc...) and believe it or not a, GUEST access built into it and active from the get go. Making adjustments such as shutting down the GUEST access option (still can't believe that) requires a ridiculous amount of time and trouble. I called for tech support and "James" in India has no clue and marginal English. TRASH assembled in China sums it up.
customer_reviews.author: Authur

customer_reviews.title: One day wonder
customer_reviews.text: Like a few others, this installed and ran effortlessly when I hooked it up. However, the next morning it wasn't connected, and absolutely refused any and all efforts to reconnect to the internet. When hooking back up my existing Asus router (which the wife hates dealing with - the reason I got the Belkin) it connected immediately. So.....back the Belkin went. I guess I'll just have to help the wife get used to the (admittedly more complicated) router we already own.
customer_reviews.author: mattm9y

customer_reviews.title: Not sure!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with my internet since I started using this router. It is unclear if this is an internet provide issue or it is the issue with this router. Regardless, its range is significant smaller than the similar model (bought brand new) last year. I am trying to give it a shot; but if it doesn't work then I may have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs re-engineering.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. 2nd one. Stops working. Tried everything. Never buy this model again. Belkin makes great products and I have used them for years but this one needs a re engineering. Refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: D.Jay

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 bedroom house. About 1000sf. The coverage does not extend much beyond the room it is located in . I would return it but I threw the box away. If you want speed and coverage, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: drew cassinelli

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Went from a Belkin NB600 to this bad boy! Extremely happy with the signal quality, the security features, and compatibility will all of our electronics. I have streamed Netflix to 3 different devices at the same time while streaming movies through this from my server to our Smart TV on another floor in the house. Not a single glitch. No loading prompts, nothing! Love how far along our wifi streaming technology has come.
customer_reviews.author: leoisright

customer_reviews.title: Modem connection drop
customer_reviews.text: This thing is trash. I bought the same model 2 years ago it worked well, but this one keeps telling me my modem is bad, which is not true since I have connection when I route my modem directly to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: HF Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: Great router! Strong signal, easy setup as main router. Difficult as hell if you want to use as an access point. To do that you need to hook it up directly to a computer and go to 192.168.2.1 and bypass the auto software and choose ACCESS POINT. It will change software settings and the ip address to 192.168.2.254 and it will magically work as an access point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Flaky
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to set up a virtual host so I could ssh into one of my computers, the router would crash every time I tried it. Even when I was not trying it, the router would often hang and die causing my work to be interrupted. The various reviews online led me to purchase the Asus RT-AC66U. Its a bit more money but appears to be rock solid in my use of it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good spped but not a long distance signal good for single family house or apartment
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of speed, no need to re start after some time like other older models. Distance might be good for single family house or duel, if larger area you might need extended routers
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav

customer_reviews.title: I truly like this Belkin
customer_reviews.text: I truly like this Belkin. After I installed it, I tried it on two laptops, and it worked fine. I had an older Belkin but it was outdated. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and had it going in 5 minutes. Everything working great! No drop singles or disconnect. Will update in a couple of weeks since this was just set up for an day now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Blazing FAST. Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 2 year old router was fine. I started getting a lag time between clicking on a link and the page loading. WOW what a difference. Click a link, blink and there is the new page. I set this up in less than 2 minutes. The setup menu is very easy to understand. No vague wording about settings. Clear explanations. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Adamscheck

customer_reviews.title: BelkinAC 1200
customer_reviews.text: This router is was not as expected. Signal strength is disappointing. My old linksys had better signal strength. Signal does not reach upstairs to my ipad.Honestly, I tried several times to fix the problem.Customer service was very good ,they attempted to rectify my problem.Not much better.Set up was not difficult at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Belkin puts them out and moves on. Support is not a priority
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago and it wasn't bad. Signal seems to be marginal at best. I purchased it right when it came out and noticed for a couple of years there were NEVER any firmware updates. I was stuck at V1.0. The products promise was to keep up with the emerging AC1200 spec but I never got updated and was the reason why I bought it in the first place. It was almost like Belkin put it out and moved on. There are always going to be firmware updates and tweaks. Not a good sign that they stand by their products. I just got an AC3150 from TP-Link, not giving Belkin another shot....
customer_reviews.author: Petey

customer_reviews.title: Belkin AC1200
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast...Super Easy. Plug and play and couldn't be happier. Easy to connect new devices....flawless operation. I was tired of other routers causing problems, requiring resets or even all out failures. This router does the trick on all accounts. I also feel like I am "technology proofed" for a while by moving to the newer AC standard.
customer_reviews.author: CarGuy

customer_reviews.title: ... this a year ago and it is still working great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago and it is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: I like reviews

customer_reviews.title: Decent range, but not good for fast connections
customer_reviews.text: This device is great it you're internet speeds are less than 100 Mbps. Its ethernet ports are limited to 10/100 speeds, so beware. You'll get 92-94 Mbps at best due to the ports.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: The customer support is horrible. Today it's not working again and I dialed ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router a month ago and it was the huge mistake! It's not working! I have to reset it almost every day. The customer support is horrible. Today it's not working again and I dialed Belkin 7 times already and they just disconnect from you right after the main menu. Even Premium Support is getting disconnected. NOTHING IS WORKING! STAY AWAY from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya Kraynova

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My problem is that this was labeled as "new" but was obviously used by someone else first. The wifi password didn't work because it had been personalized, and the cords were out of their packaging and already plugged in. Bottom line is I had to have it returned and waiting for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: chuck schroeter

customer_reviews.title: Some problems on installing
customer_reviews.text: Router I now working after three calls to support. First call, hung up on me, did not call back or enter my info. Second call, followed instructions but missed the fact when she told me to reboot my modem....phone system is on net (should have caught this error myself). Third text got me running at last. All three had heavy accents, so they farm outside US. Would I buy another Belkin product? Not likely. I like smooth installs, this was far from that. I consider myself well versed with networks since I supported networks from Novell to MS. Hope this helps next buyer. Maybe it will go better, this is my second Belkin.
customer_reviews.author: Top, Wayne Cook

customer_reviews.title: Bad Choice
customer_reviews.text: When this router works it should get 5 stars,the problem is it doesn't work reliably if at all. After constantly having to reset we finally gave up and went back to our old Belkin 54g. A lot of expense for a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Pines Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Reaches far...
customer_reviews.text: I had such difficulty getting the other router plus a booster to maintain wifi connection to our upstairs, that I bought this and kept my fingers crossed. Have not had this very long but so far it is steadfast and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Henkaline

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used many Belkin products, they are all good, this router is good and does the job as described, however, the coverage is not very good, i live in 3 story villa, the router can cover with difficulty 2 only
customer_reviews.author: Asem

customer_reviews.title: I had the Belkin AC12000 Dual Band Version 1 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the Belkin AC12000 Dual Band Version 1 and was giving me many problems. very slow, fail connecting, had to reboobt many times.Since I change it to the Version 4, all is going well ... no problems at all! Make sure that you order Version 4, it might cost a little more, but in the long run it is more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Efraín Morales Dávila

customer_reviews.title: The best yet
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the Belkin n-750 to the AC 1200. Much faster and longer range within the house. I am very impressed with this modem The set up is so simple. Literally plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Muy Man

customer_reviews.title: What a huge waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This thing never worked well. I always had a problem and had to call customer service. Each call took over an hour. What a huge waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Often disconnects
customer_reviews.text: This router works okay when it is connected to my laptop. But I often need to reconnect it to my laptop... at least twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, faster and fastest!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a huge difference from my $49.95 Linksys wireless router when I set up this Belkin. It took me less than 10 minutes to set it up. This Belkin instantly made my life so much more productive. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The router disconnects often and needed to wait minutes for it to reconnect. Otherwise it is very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for my home wifi!! Works great for streaming and all computer tasks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy..the guest network is simple and the 2.4Ghz works great and supports chromecast and sonos media streaming. Unfortunately my devices cannot yet work on the 5Ghz, but a friends phone did work. Simple to set up via the CD, the web URL did not work and my unit was a restock, so it was not in the proper order, but simple enough.
customer_reviews.author: pmorrsn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't reach the back porch which is a disappointment but it's definitely fast and a breeze to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: fast router
customer_reviews.text: works great and solved a problem of slow internet access with my old router
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Willems

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless router. Works for devices upstairs and even on back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Beware - this one is Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Totally unsatisfactory!, even after having it reconfigured multiple times by Belkin Tech Service. This one is a loser !
customer_reviews.author: Easygoer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: was hoping it would make my hulu and netflex work faster and not cut out as much.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Steward

customer_reviews.title: Belkin ac1200
customer_reviews.text: The ac1200 dual band router replaced my old belkin n600db. Everything worked without a hitch except for intellistream, the speedtest belkin program failed 5 straight times. Then ran speedtest.net to get my speeds and was able to setup intellistream manually. Now working fine and have noticed my internet speed maintains a much faster speed than my old router. Would reccomend to a friend. This is the most expensive router i've ever bought but seems to be well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this would not even allow us to stream netflix! we returned it asap
customer_reviews.author: Wectmall

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine for large home
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet my needs. Was likely overkiill. It is impressive to look at though. Probably great for household with lots of electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: Still Learning

customer_reviews.title: Great router - Great price
customer_reviews.text: Best router I have had in a while. Easy set up right out of the box. I keep loosing one IP address but the seems to be a recurring problem with Cox.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Parry

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems downloading movies on my TV downstairs but when I got this model it solved all my problems.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Wiese

customer_reviews.title: iIt worked great for almost a year
customer_reviews.text: iIt worked great for almost a year, then I had to start restarting it about 4-5 times a week. Disappointed, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kratz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: When I first started setting it up I had a PEBKAC moment, connecting through Wi-Fi I changed the SSID without first changing the key and took several minutes to figure out why I could not connect. One simple factory reset later and it is set up and running smoothly. The only real frustration I have with it is none of my current devices are compatible with its 5Gb/s connection.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Warby

customer_reviews.title: Belkin AC1200 Dual Band Wireless AC Router +
customer_reviews.text: The Belkin AC1200 Dual Band Wireless AC Router + is a excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Yahisrael

customer_reviews.title: It is everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I expected, it is much more than anyone's previous routers it sets up in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Rickell

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: Great router, have tried many different routers to reach to the far ends of my wifi-killing home. This one gets there and then some. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Poor range and speeds
customer_reviews.text: Range and speed have been really poor, not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Mueller

customer_reviews.title: BELKIN AC1200 dual band AC router recommeded
customer_reviews.text: i upgraded from a order belkin (n300) with i love too.it just got outdated..anyway this belkin ac1200 100 times better.. signal go further doesn't drop signal an the price is right!!! all an all product..
customer_reviews.author: keala ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: This router works great. No issues with it. Easy to set up from a laptop or smartphone. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Wireless Router that I have Ever Installed
customer_reviews.text: Installing this router was as easy as plugging it in and typing in their security code. The router comes with an automatic guest option, which has it's own code. I have a house that is half plaster and lath and 1/2 drywall. The plaster and lath acts as a barrier to some router's signal. This router is sending "excellent" signals to all places in the house.
customer_reviews.author: HSHCLD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This router has definitely met my expectations. Easy to setup and no loss of internet connection. I been using this router for at least 2 months, with 4 or more people using the router and I've had not 1 issue. Can't complain. My previous router I had to constantly reset. Highly recommend the AC1200.
customer_reviews.author: D Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Choose another brand
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back. After multiple crashes, disconnects, phone calls to to support, etc. it wasn't worth it anymore. I bought a Linksys instead and it has been perfect! Even Xfinity told me to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: I was told to buy this model by a BELKIN ...
customer_reviews.text: I was told to buy this model by a BELKIN rep due to slow wireless internet speeds. After a week of nothing but issues (one iphone would not hook up to the internet, slow speeds, etc), I re-installed my little cheap N300 router.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell J.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a strong enough system- can pick up on one TV and not on the other and vice versa
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It took hours to set up with Belkin technician's help ...
customer_reviews.text: It took hours to set up with Belkin technician's help on the phone. It is unreliable, has not increased the coverage area from one room to another and we never know which device will work.
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Password is on the machine to connect wirelessly. 192.168.2.1 is the ip address to log on to to change settings. Great quality. Not sure about the AC portition yet but it's a great wireless N router. May be ahead of the game for a year or two until they finalized the AC portion.
customer_reviews.author: drum_24

customer_reviews.title: It is ok but not in love. Doesn't reach as well as it says but ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok but not in love. Doesn't reach as well as it says but didn't have my hopes too high. Gets the job done but not worth the price I think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not much better in range than my old $10 N300. So many problems connecting to the wireless secure or guest account on various devices
customer_reviews.author: Todd VanDermark

customer_reviews.title: Great router; quality customer service when called
customer_reviews.text: Great router; quality customer service when called. I would definitely use a Belkin product in the future. My cable modem was the actual problem when I called customer service and they helped me figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bradfield

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This Item only worked for certain electronic devices; eg. it would not work on wii or my Iphone 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belkin router
customer_reviews.text: This router is a must have and well worth the money. It fixed all my Internet problems and allows me to track every device that uses it. It also allows a guest feed like in a motel and was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I HATE IT
customer_reviews.text: I perches 2 month ago but problem hang weekly 3/4 time { I HATE IT }.Bad work too much problem .loss my money.
customer_reviews.author: Sk Kabirul Hashan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy set up. Goes threw walls pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty okay. Seems secure enough, and allows for limiting to specific IPs and whatnot. My network is performing well on this machine. I have seen some occasional hiccups, which could be the device, or environmental interference. I live in an apartment block with several home networks near me. Unfortunately, most of my devices aren't capable of driving 5G, just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Generic Pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: ... improved the speed of my laptop computer - very good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This router has greatly improved the speed of my laptop computer - very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Val Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Belkin AC1200 Router
customer_reviews.text: Good Router. Fast. Almost as fast as my wired connection. Easy to set up. Much faster than my Belkin N600 router.
customer_reviews.author: Donkie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great out of the box. Replacing a Linksys Router. Streaming all my videos and pictures via WIFI flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: MDF

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: The wireless router that I was using would drop the signal and was very frustrating. This is great. highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: John Godwin

customer_reviews.title: AC 1200
customer_reviews.text: The new modem was easy to set up. No problem accessing internet t all. Much improved download speeds over older Belkin modem.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Delaney

customer_reviews.title: very good item
customer_reviews.text: very good item. Met all of my expectations. Would recommend this item to friends. Very good price and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Greene

customer_reviews.title: Belkin AC1200 - Move on to something else, really anything els is better
customer_reviews.text: Useless piece junk packaged in form of wifi router. Consistently hung or spins whenever you try to download something within the house not internet.
customer_reviews.author: BKay LLC

customer_reviews.title: Broke.
customer_reviews.text: This router broke less than a year after I bought it. I know routers have a short lifespan but this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but drop offs. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: my belkin ac 1200 is excellent
customer_reviews.text: so far it working just i want it to,and would recommend it to anyone looking to view movies online thank you
customer_reviews.author: alfred mutua

customer_reviews.title: Could not install
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 times to install this Belkin router, instructions were confusingand the lack of a CD included in the box made it very frustrating. although there was an option they didn't use CD that never worked either. tech support was not able to resolve, I am returning for a refund. ended up getting a Netgear router from Costco that connected to the internet right away
customer_reviews.author: Jerry P. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade from my old Belkin, this adds the opportunity to have more devices connected and is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: poor range and couldn't alter the set password by previous
customer_reviews.text: Does not connect very well to devices, sometimes takes 20 minutes to connect, poor range and couldn't alter the set password by previous owner
customer_reviews.author: ryan fetting

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great router with good Wi-Fi signal strength in entire home. Easy setup process. Sleek shape is a plus, as it fits easily without adding extra space
customer_reviews.author: Incredibles

customer_reviews.title: Great next-gen router
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to set up, wireless router has guest networks built in. Very fast, and it is 802.11ac capable, which is the next generation of wireless technology. Most computers and tablets dont have this technology in them yet, but I know that this router will stay fast and stay relevant for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Zach Plesent

customer_reviews.title: Belkin AC1200 DB Router
customer_reviews.text: Got this router to replace my current Belkin N+ router which was ok. This one is better! With the Dual Band capability, it really helps with the different wireless devices we have in the house. Newer ones connect to the 5ghz while the older ones use the 2.4ghz. Can't go wrong with this machine!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Best router I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This router is easy to set up and use. I have had dual band N routers in the past and even though no device I am connecting in my house exceeds N, The AC router is faster. It just simply is.
customer_reviews.author: Fun

customer_reviews.title: wonderful addition
customer_reviews.text: did everything that was needed for wireless connectivity between the base and the remote computer. would suggest it for any wireless user with a remote station
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good router . good range for a big house .
customer_reviews.text: good router just not for gaming i expected more from it but internet searching wise its awesome . just make sure you dont have Comcast and this router at the same time .
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: WiFi very unstable, have to turn-off and on the ...
customer_reviews.text: WiFi very unstable, have to turn-off and on the router quite frequently to activate it.
customer_reviews.author: Vangelis Sismanoglou

customer_reviews.title: best router for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should own this router. No software. Plug n play and secure. Suck it netgear. No lag on my ps 3 while im dling on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: matthew rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item used and it works well. Condition was "as advertised".
customer_reviews.author: CTM

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Netgear with this piece is shizne. I miss Netgear soo much. Month 1it reset itself and called itself Broadcom instead of Belkin, dropping all security settings and wireless password keys. Connection issues are constant, occurring multiple times a day in less than 3 months old. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: GMac

customer_reviews.title: IT DID NOT MEET EXPECTATIONS
customer_reviews.text: I HAD A BELKIN ROUTER WHICH WAS 4-5 YEARS OLD AND THE INTERNET WAS NOT WORKING AS BEFORE, SO I UPGRADED THE INTERNET SPEED AND STILL DIDN'T WORK. I WAS TOLD THAT I NEED A NEW ROUTER, SO I THOUGHT THAT THE BELKIN AC 1200 WAS AN UPGRADE TO THE ONE I HAD, TURNED OUT TO BE WORST!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cain

product_meta.title: Belkin AC 1200 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Router (F9K1113)
product_meta.description:
Style:AC 1200Belkin AC 1200 DB Wi-Fi Dual-Band AC+ Gigabit Router (F9K1113)

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Up to 2.8X faster than N Technology
New level of performance for reliability and coverage; Compatible with 'N' & 'G' technology
Dual-band for multiple device, multiple movie streaming
Easy Setup with Simple Start. Use the router's built-in web-based setup page and set up the router without a CD
Our Customer Service team is very able to help and support all of our customers. Our tech support number is 1-800-223-5546

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,567 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
